welcome_message_body: Welcome to Gyumri, the cultural gem of Armenia! Get ready to be enchanted by its cobblestone streets, historical architecture, and warm hospitality. Explore our vibrant markets, indulge in traditional cuisine, and soak up the charm of this beautiful city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Cherkezi Dzor (Fish Valley)
restaurants.description: Cherkezi Dzor (Fish Valley) is a seafood restaurant located in Գյումրի.

restaurants.name: Aregak
restaurants.description: Aregak is a bakery located in the city.

restaurants.description: Pizza Jazz is a pizzeria located in Գյումրի.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gyoumri Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
